nodes.text: Vi'i'che was a male individual who worked as a cranksman in a dig-rig crew on Vernid. He had wide eyes and a beard of tendrils that was festooned with gold rings. When his coworker, Major Soran Keize of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, who was living on Vernid under the alias "Devon Lhent," expressed his dislike of the New Republic after learning they had caused collateral damage during their attack on the Imperial planet Pandem Nai, Vi'i'che was shocked, suggesting that "Lhent" had drunk too much mijura.
